TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1055
TEI.2.document_title: Isaac C. Oglem to Stephen F. Austin, 03-09-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Isaac D. Oglem to Austin, March 9, 1825. Proposal to build gins, saw mills, etc.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1055

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Isaac D. Oglem to Austin, March 9, 1825. Proposal to build gins, saw mills, etc.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Red River Rapide Louisiana*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="03-09-1825">March 9th 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Sir Having been an early *person_mentioned*visitor*/person_mentioned* of your part of the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* and always entertained of it a favourable opinion I have it in contemplation to move to that part of the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*on Condition that I can purchase land of you My Friend *person_mentioned*William G Grant*/person_mentioned* [is] the bearer of this I have obligated myself to him to let him have two or three *person_mentioned*hands*/person_mentioned* to build *location_mentioned*Gins Saw mills*/location_mentioned* or any other building that he thinks proper to build Also I have agreed to furnish all irons *location_mentioned*Gin*/location_mentioned* stand etc any obligation or contrat he makes or binds himself to you I will be willing to comply with */p* *p**person_mentioned*Isaac D. Oglem*/person_mentioned* (?)*/p*
*p*N B not having the pleasure of being Personal accounted [acquainted] with you I will refer you to *person_mentioned*Capt R Jones*/person_mentioned* or *person_mentioned*James Jones*/person_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Randolph and Isaac Foster*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
